meanings.definition: A person or thing that is considered to be genuine or authentic.
meanings.sent1: My grandma's antique necklace is a real dinkums.
meanings.sent2: The old map was a dinkums, showing the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent3: I couldn't believe my luck when I found a dinkums at the flea market.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a dinkums, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The handwritten letter was a dinkums, proving its authenticity.

meanings.definition: Used as an exclamation to express disbelief or surprise.
meanings.sent1: Dinkums! I can't believe you won the contest.
meanings.sent2: Oh dinkums, I forgot my keys at home.
meanings.sent3: Dinkums, that magician really made the rabbit disappear!
meanings.sent4: Her sudden appearance was a dinkums, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected plot twist was a real dinkums in the movie.
